transcript_summary: Ethan contacted the user regarding a chargeback request for their Shrek Premium subscription, which is not a valid cancellation method. The user chose to renew the subscription instead of canceling it. Ethan confirmed the renewal and ended the call.

transcript.message: Hello. I'm Ethan, calling about your recent chargeback request for the subscription of  Shrek Premium.
I need to inform you that a chargeback is not recognized as a valid method for canceling your Shrek Premium subscription. That action will not be accepted.
Hello, shall I do anything with that?
You have two options to resolve this. We can proceed with an official cancellation of your Shrek Premium subscription according to the terms, or you can choose to renew it.
I think I can renew it. I think it was a mistake to cancel it by a chargeback.
Thank you for clarifying. We will proceed with the renewal of your Shrek Premium subscription. Have a good day.
